item.description: http://www.goethe.de/... Holiday Wein-Bar Social Event/Networking Friday, December 07, 2012, 6:00–9:00 pm Goethe-Institut Boston, 170 Beacon Street, Boston Admission: $20 Info: +1 (617) 262-6050 or info@boston.goethe.org Please join us for a casual evening of wine tasting, light refreshments, and good conversation in our beautiful Back Bay ballroom. Live music. Holiday Wein-Bar: 12/7/2012. Ticket reservation recommended! Enjoy the traditional German holiday spirit with "Glühwein" (hot mulled wine) and "Lebkuchen" (spiced cookies). We'll also serve German Würstchen and Kartoffelsalat, Brezeln, and more. Contemporary American pianist Doug Hammer and French Canadian soprano vocalist Amethyste will perform a wonderful array of traditional, international and original Christmas Carols. Event Registration Online for Holiday Wein-Bar at the Goethe-Institut powered by Eventbrite Strongly recommended get your ticket prior event, RSVP if you have the ticket, wear a name tag " euro meetup with your name " , find members of euromeetup and mingle with crowd . I ll greet you at the entrance from about 6-7. Then txt please 781-718-6203 . Looking forward to see you! Maia

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Glühwein at the Goethe !
